Package chav1961.purelib.i18n.interfaces

This package contains description of locale-specific interfaces and annotations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocaleSpecificTextGetter
    This interface describes any locale-specific entities (usually GUI items).
    LocaleSpecificTextSetter
    This interface describes any locale-specific entities (usually GUI items).
    Localizer
    This interface describes a wrapper for the standard Java internationalization mechanism.
    Localizer.LocaleChangeListener
    This interface describes listener to process locale changes.
    Localizer.LocaleDescriptor
    This interface describes descriptor of the supported locale.
    Localizer.LocaleWalking
    This interface describes walking processor for all Localizers tree
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    LocaleResource
    This annotation describes any locale-specific resources associated with the given field.
    LocaleResourceLocation
    This annotation describes any locale-specific resources associated with the given Java class.

Package chav1961.purelib.i18n.interfaces Description

This package contains description of locale-specific interfaces and annotations.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
